name: Eva
dialogue: I'm so glad we could all get together like this. It's been too long since we've had a chance to catch up.

name: Isabella
dialogue: I know, right? I've missed our little group chats.

name: Grace
dialogue: Me too. It's always nice to connect with everyone.

name: Henry
dialogue: Absolutely. And speaking of connecting, have any of you heard the latest historical findings? I think you all would be fascinated.
